author: 269chantal
title: Beautiful
text: Me and my sister were staying two weeks in this hotel. It is a really beautiful and great hotel. The employees there are very friendly and when we had question they do all their best for helping us. They all can speak english so the communication was very good. The hotel is nearly the houhai and qianhai where are a lot of restaurants and few souvenir shops. Near are two subway lines so we had a very good connection to the sightseeing places. It was a very great vacation and we would love to go to this hotel the next time again.
